name: Pagoda
strategy: Can only be built in cities following a religion with the Pagodas belief. Construct this building by purchasing it with Faith.
historical_info: Commonly found throughout Asia, the Pagoda is an architectural style consisting of a multi-tiered tower typically featuring oversized eaves and a prominent finial at its peak. Most pagodas are associated with the Buddhist religion, as they were frequently constructed on or near Buddhist temple compounds in order to house sacred relics.
